screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .yrcbck file in YRC Group Weblink
screenshot.caption: YRCBCK file open in YRC Group Weblink

description: Weblink is a web browser that was published by the Indian company YRC Group, which has since become Yash Impacts. YRC Group discontinued Weblink in 2014, but the program is still available for download from Yash Impacts' website.

Users can save a copy of their Weblink data to a YRCBCK file. This allows them to back up their data and reload it if, for example, they are forced to reinstall Weblink. To create a YRCBCK file in Weblink:
The YRCBCK file will be saved with a filename that uses the format backup-dd-mm-yy.yrcbck . This allows you to quickly see when the file was created.

images.alt: Screenshot of a .yrcbck file in YRC Group Weblink
images.caption: YRCBCK file open in YRC Group Weblink
